GLUDELETENURBSRENDERER(3G) GLUDELETENURBSRENDERER(3G)

NAME

gluDeleteNurbsRenderer - destroy a NURBS object

C SPECIFICATION

void gluDeleteNurbsRenderer( GLUnurbs* nurb )









PARAMETERS



  
nurb

  
Specifies the NURBS object to be destroyed.








DESCRIPTION


gluDeleteNurbsRenderer destroys the NURBS object (which was
    created with gluNewNurbsRenderer) and frees any memory it uses. Once
    gluDeleteNurbsRenderer has been called, nurb cannot be used
    again.






SEE
  ALSO


gluNewNurbsRenderer
